nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi The Official Movie Companion

Star Wars: The Last Jedi The Official Movie Companion is a standalone issue of the Star Wars Insider magazine. It was released on June 19, 2018, and, as indicated by the title, acted as a guide to various events and characters in Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.

Scene-by-scene trivia and information from the latest Star Wars movie, The Last Jedi along with interviews with the cast and crew of the film. Also features fantastic images and production art. An essential companion to the film and for all fans of the saga.
